Name: Turn off of unused sprinklers.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the turn off of unused sprinklers.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Parks and Recreation

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows: 
	
Section 1. Chapter 1 of title 18 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 18-140 to read as follows: 
§18-140 Sprinkler turnoff. On or before June 1, 2012, the department shall install a mechanism to turn off sprinklers in property under the jurisdiction of the department that are meant for use by the public.  Such mechanism shall shut off such sprinklers after a fixed duration of time determined by the commissioner. There shall be a mechanism to turn the sprinklers back on when individuals want to use it.
§2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon enactment.





LF 
LS #1512
2/9/11
